channel.title: Few Simba questions
channel.description:
Hey guys,
First of all, is it possible to disable the sound of rs via smart? I've got all the sounds onto nothing yet I still hear my account does X things.
Is it possible to get/look/update the some of the non-working scripts in the MSI panel?
Also is it possible to make it log in X world? mainly it keeps logging me into the main busy worlds and it is packed as hell.
That is all for now,
Thanks.

item.title: Few Simba questions
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

You should browse through the SRL reference (I don’t know the link, but you can find it on Villavu). Pretty much everything you ask for is either part of a function (like log in to world X), doable with the help of a function (disable the sound) or a great way to learn SRL (updating scripts).

In other words, roll up your sleeves because it’s time for some DIY.

Read full topic
